Name: Stunt Legends
About the game: Stunt Legends is a blast of colors and adrenaline, high speed and fun with no limits. This car stunt racing game lets you drive high octane number muscle cars. Explore British countryside roads freely and uncover every mistery of the city. Dive into the bright nature and cover your car with mud of offroad trails. Drifting, high speed and every sort of stunt are waiting for you, only in this unique and innovative stunt racing game. The realism of details will grab you until you feel the pistons moving in yout bones. Weekly updates will add new cars and events for unlimited fun in an ever-evolving world.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Stunt Legends? Check out the release date (Oct 6, 2022), developer insights from Tuning Mania, and a complete game summary.
